
```{r, include=FALSE}
library(gior)
library(dplyr)
library(crosstalk)
```

```{r}
data("country_data")

sd <- country_data %>% 
  dplyr::group_by(from) %>% 
  dplyr::summarise(value = sum(value))

sd <- SharedData$new(sd, key = sd$from)

# Use SharedData like a dataframe with Crosstalk-enabled widgets
bscols(
  country_data %>% gior(sd = sd) %>% g_data(from, to, value),
  DT::datatable(sd, extensions="Scroller", style="bootstrap", class="compact", width="100%",
    options=list(deferRender=TRUE, scrollY=300, scroller=TRUE), selection = "single")
)
```
